name: Night of the Red Cubes
description:
Night of the Red Cubes is a simple, but challenging top-down shooter where you play as a blue cube, struggling to survive against hordes of aggressive red cubes.

- Challenging gameplay against hordes of enemies

- After killing 75 of the red cubes, unlock a powerful new weapon, but also attract the attention of the Big Reds, who take 20 shots to kill

- See how high of a score you can get
